members.name: save
members.description: Takes screenshot and saves the image

params.name: format.
params.description: Format can take the value of either 'jpg' or 'png'On ios, only 'jpg' format is supported

params.name: quality.
params.description: Determines the quality of the screenshot.       Default quality is set to 100.

params.name: filename.
params.description: Name of the file as stored on the storage

members.name: URI
members.description: Takes screenshot and returns the image as an URI

params.name: quality.
params.description: Determines the quality of the screenshot.       Default quality is set to 100.
